Technique: CARVED; LOW RELIEF; ENGRAVED; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Stela
Description: Small stela depicting Queen Ahmes-Nefertari. She is seated on a throne and dressed in a long pleated garment. She is wearing a long wig and the vulture cap, on which the high double feathered crown is set on a kalathos with a small sun disc. There are two lines of inscription in ink below the representation.The veneration of Ahmes-Nefertari and the title of the dedicator indicate Deir el-Medinah as the provenance.
